verses.verse: I exhort<WG3870> therefore<WG3767>, first<WG4412> of all<WG3956>, that<WG4160> supplications<WG1162>, prayers<WG4335>, intercessions<WG1783>, thanksgivings<WG2169>, be made<WG4160> for<WG5228> all<WG3956> men<WG444>;

for <WG5228> kings<WG935> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> that are<WG5607> in<WG1722> high place<WG5247>; that<WG2443> we may lead<WG1236> a tranquil<WG2263> and<WG2532> quiet<WG2263> life<WG979> in<WG1722> all<WG3956> godliness<WG2150> and<WG2532> gravity<WG4587>.
<WG1063> This<WG5124> is good<WG2570> and<WG2532> acceptable<WG587> in the sight of<WG1799> God<WG2316> our<WG2257> Saviour<WG4990>;
who <WG3739> would have<WG2309> all<WG3956> men<WG444> to be saved<WG4982>, and<WG2532> come<WG2064> to<WG1519> the knowledge<WG1922> of the truth<WG225>.
For <WG1063> there is one<WG1520> God<WG2316>, <WG2532> one<WG1520> mediator<WG3316> also between God<WG2316> and<WG2532> men<WG444>, himself man<WG444>, Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424>,
who gave<WG1325> himself<WG1438> a ransom<WG487> for<WG5228> all<WG3956>; the testimony to be borne<WG3142> in its own<WG2398> times<WG2540>;

whereunto3739, 1519 I<WG1473> was appointed<WG5087> a preacher<WG2783> and<WG2532> an apostle<WG652> (I speak<WG3004> the truth<WG225>, I lie<WG5574> not<WG3756>), a teacher<WG1320> of the Gentiles<WG1484> in<WG1722> faith<WG4102> and<WG2532> truth<WG225>.

I desire<WG1014> therefore<WG3767> that<WG4336> the men<WG435> pray<WG4336> in every<WG3956> place<WG5117>, lifting up<WG1869> holy<WG3741> hands<WG5495>, without<WG5565> wrath<WG3709> and<WG2532> disputing<WG1261>.

In like manner<WG5615>, <WG2532> that<WG2885> women<WG1135> adorn<WG2885> themselves<WG1438> in<WG1722> modest<WG2887> apparel<WG2689>, with<WG3326> shamefastness<WG127> and<WG2532> sobriety<WG4997>; not<WG3361> with<WG1722> braided hair<WG4117>, and<WG2228> gold<WG5557> or<WG2228> pearls<WG3135> or<WG2228> costly<WG4185> raiment<WG2441>;
but <WG235> (which<WG3739> becometh<WG4241> women<WG1135> professing<WG1861> godliness<WG2317>) through<WG1223> good<WG18> works<WG2041>.
Let <WG3129> a woman<WG1135> learn<WG3129> in<WG1722> quietness<WG2271> with<WG1722> all<WG3956> subjection<WG5292>.
But <WG1161> I permit<WG2010> not<WG3756> a woman<WG1135> to teach<WG1321>, nor<WG3761> to have dominion over<WG831> a man<WG435>, but<WG235> to be<WG1511> in<WG1722> quietness<WG2271>.
For <WG1063> Adam<WG76> was<WG4111> first<WG4413> formed<WG4111>, then<WG1534> Eve<WG2096>;
and <WG2532> Adam<WG76> was<WG538> not<WG3756> beguiled<WG538>, but<WG1161> the woman<WG1135> being beguiled<WG538> hath<WG1096> fallen into<WG1722> transgression<WG3847>:

but <WG1161> she shall be saved<WG4982> through<WG1223> her child-bearing<WG5042>, if<WG1437> they continue<WG3306> in<WG1223> faith<WG4102> and<WG2532> love<WG26> and<WG2532> sanctification<WG38> with<WG3326> sobriety<WG4997>.
